boardgame.name: Mage Wars Academy
Mage Wars Academy: Grundspiel – Tiermeister vs Zauberer
Mage Wars Akademia
boardgame.description: Mage Wars Academy features gameplay similar to Mage Wars Arena (n_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;e Mage Wars) with two mages in head-to-head combat to see who will be victorious._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Mage Wars Academy is a two-player starter set that features two mages, two spellbooks, and a new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;boardless_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; gameplay design that's more portable and fast-playing than Mage Wars Arena. All of the spell cards included in Academy are compatible with those in Arena._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Multiple core sets (or future expansions) can be added together to create a 3 or 4 player game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 66- Dark Moon and Relationship Games
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Mage Wars Academy/Mage Wars: Arena Dice Tower Promo 2016
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: RDTN Episode 74 – Do You Believe in Magic: Review of Ashes -Rise of the Phoenixborn, Vs. System 2PCG, Mage Wars Academy, and Fields of Arle

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Purchased at Gen Con 2015. Box out of shrink, but tokens unpunched/cards still shrinked. Purple dice included.
Only played twice. All the cards are sleeved. Extra cards for deck building will come in a deck box.
New in shrink.
